availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William Markham Green Jr. (Russell County, Kentucky, farmer, slaveholder, and county judge. )

body.p: Russell County, Kentucky, farmer and county judge. Kentucky native. Father of Eliza Susan Green Spencer. Farmer in Russell County, Kentucky in 1850. Owned nine enslaved persons in Russell County, Kentucky in 1850. County judge in Russell County, Kentucky in 1860. Owned five enslaved persons in Russell County, Kentucky in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Russell County, p. 535.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Russell County, p. 6.

Kentucky, Wills and Probate Records, 1774-1989, Kentucky County, District, and Probate Courts, Marion County Wills, vol. 1-2, 1863-1949, p.199.
